ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Simon J. MacDonald ** RETIREMENT AND ANNUITY **
PrecisRetirement and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. SIMON J. MACDONALD, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, effective December 17, 2016.
AttachmentsAttachment
